description: Export Android resources, like pngs, nine-patch, app icon and vector drawable.
no_selection: Please select at least one layer.
least_version_desc: Android Res Export %1 is currently the newest version available.
older_version_desc:
You are use the old verion of Automate Sketch. (%1)
Click "OK" to download newest version.
failure_update_desc:
Please visite the web site and download newest version.
%1.
can_not_create_nine_patch_from_artboard_: Can't create Nine-Patch from Artboard or Symbol Master.
asset_name_for_vector_drawable: Asset name for new vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_text: Text layer can't covert to vector drawable, you can convert to outlines first.
vector_drawable_no_support_bitmap: Bitmap layer can't covert to vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_symbol_instan: Symbol can't covert to vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_rotation: Rotation is not supported by vector drawable, please flatten first.
vector_drawable_no_support_flipped: Flipped is not supported by vector drawable, please flatten first.
vector_drawable_no_support_mask: Mask is not supported by vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_fill: Only solid fill is supported by vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_border: Only solid border is supported by vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_shadow: Shape layer with shadow is not supported by vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_inner_shadow: Shape layer with inner shadow is not supported by vector drawable.
vector_drawable_no_support_blur: Shape layer with blur is not supported by vector drawable.
can_not_group_artboard: Can't group with Artboard or Symbol Master.
no_duplicate_and_invaild_asset_name: No duplicate and invaild asset name.
select_app_icon_artboard: Please selected the app icon artboard or symbol master.
app_icon_artboard_tips: Your icon must in an artboard or symbol master, and the size must be 192x192px.
install_imagemagick_title: Please check that you have ImageMagick installed.
install_imagemagick_message:
Export Android nine-patch image feature depend on ImageMagick library.
Install use HomeBrew:
$ brew install ImageMagick
s2v_version_message:
Run follow command in the Terminal to update svg2vectordrawable.
$ npm update -g svg2vectordrawable
install_svgo_and_s2v_title: Please check that you have SVGO and svg2vectordrawable installed.
install_svgo_and_s2v_message:
Export Android vector drawable feature depend on Node.js, SVGO and svg2vectordrawable.
After you installed Node.js, run follow command in the Terminal.
$ npm install -g svgo svg2vectordrawable
use_imageoptim_after_export: Optimize Images use ImageOptim After Export.
too_many_color_stop: The gradient in Android shape drawable not support greater than 3 colors.
no_support_fill_type: The fill type is not support for Android shape drawable.
no_support_stroke_type: The stroke type is not support for Android shape drawable.
no_support_shape: Only support shape layer like rectangle or oval.
no_shape_layer: Please choose one shape layer like rectangle or oval.
